title: Petzl CARITOOL Tool Carrier - Lightweight Harness Attachment for Easy Storage and Access to Climbing and Mountaineering Gear
features: EASY GEAR ACCESS: For ice climbing, mountaineering, and aid, the CARITOOL is an indispensable solution that allows you to store, sort, and carry everything from ice tools and screws to pitons and hammers.
WIDE COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with the “ice clipper” slots on most Petzl harnesses and those from other brands, it also attaches to the webbing waist belts of many harnesses without slots.

UNIQUE SORTING RIDGE: The exaggerated horn on the top of the CARITOOL lets you temporarily rack ice screws, pitons, and nuts on the top of the device while you sort through your gear for the right size.
QUICK HOLSTERING OF TOOLS: Store and retrieve your ice tools (or a hammer) with a single hand, thanks to a wide basket and easy-to-activate wiregate.
This product is not personal protective equipment (PPE). It can only hold the weight of equipment up to 5 kg.
description: Increase your gear carrying options with the CARITOOL. A great accessory for mountaineering, ice climbing and long routes, it allows quick access and organization of ice screws, ice tools, pitons, nuts, and other alpine equipment. Compatible with the slots on most Petzl harnesses and also attaches to the webbing waist belts of other harnesses.
